segments.text: Could I pay for my parking ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to see your ticket . Do you have it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to need to see your ID .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't pay your fine without your ID .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't understand why I can't just pay you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have to make sure that the person issued the ticket is the one paying it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just come back when you have your ID with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will my record be cleared after I pay the fine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only if you pay your fine .
segments.speaker: S2
